title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
00:41 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
00:50 <rrodriguez> has quit  
00:51 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
00:55 <abusenius> has quit  
02:46 <DrLou> has quit  
07:07 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:08 <rrodriguez> has quit  
07:43 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
07:53 <vmassol> has quit  
08:13 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning. Cool it seems all tests are passing: http://ci.xwiki.org/ :)  
08:36 <@sdumitriu> Some flickering, though  
08:36 <+mflorea> good morning, yep, everything seems ready for release  
08:36 <vmassol> who's the RM already?  
08:37 <@sdumitriu> Me  
08:37 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ok. Can you start the release today?  
08:37 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
08:37 <vmassol> we need a BM too for this week: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BuildManagerRoster  
08:38 <vmassol> thomas or marius I'd say  
08:38 <+mflorea> I'll take it  
08:38 <vmassol> (based on # of times)  
08:38 <vmassol> ok great thanks marius  
08:38 <vmassol> I'll update the roster  
08:43 <vmassol> sburjan`: good morning. Will you have time to start testing 3.2M3 as soon as it's released so that we can fix any important issue before RC1 which is next Monday?  
09:05 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
09:06 <vmassol> sdumitriu: I looked for "stream" in my default XE and I get "Attachments" page before "Activity Stream" page. Would you know why?  
09:06 <@sdumitriu> There's a problem with the titles  
09:06 <vmassol> when I go to the Attachments page there's no stream in the page (view action)  
09:06 <vmassol> ah?  
09:06 <@sdumitriu> The $msg is not in the velocity context  
09:06 <@sdumitriu> So the title known by Lucene is $msg.get('blabla')  
09:07 <vmassol> do we have a jira issue for this?  
09:07 <vmassol> do we release M3 with this?  
09:07 <@sdumitriu> Cut the title, there's little left to properly score the activity stream document  
09:07 <vmassol> can we fix it before 3.2 final?  
09:07 <@sdumitriu> We can  
09:07 <@sdumitriu> Worst case, manual workaround just for $msg  
09:08 <@sdumitriu> (i.e. put it in vcontext in the lucene plugin)  
09:08 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:08 <vmassol> hmm can't we do this now so that it's in for M3 and fix it better for 3.2 final?  
09:08 <@sdumitriu> Noticed that myself searching for panel wizard  
09:08 <sburjan`> has quit  
09:08 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
09:08 <@sdumitriu> Yes, I'll do it after I sleep, just before releasing  
09:09 <vmassol> ok  
09:09 <@sdumitriu> I'm still waiting for a good suggestion for that name I asked you about last night  
09:09 <@sdumitriu> Going to sleep now  
09:09 <vmassol> ok I'll read the logs  
09:09 <sdumitriu> has quit  
09:09 <vmassol> nn  
09:13 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
09:25 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
09:34 <vmassol> sburjan: good morning  
09:34 <+sburjan> good morning vmassol  
09:34 <vmassol> in case you didn't see it above, I sent you this:  
09:35 <vmassol> sburjan`: good morning. Will you have time to start testing 3.2M3 as soon as it's released so that we can fix any important issue before RC1 which is next Monday?  
09:35 <vmassol> (probably went to your home computer AFAIU ;))  
09:35 <+sburjan> I think so, yes.. I was in the bus when you wrote this  
09:35 <+sburjan> yes, I will test after release :)  
09:35 <vmassol> it's planned for later today  
09:35 <+sburjan> I'll make the time  
09:35 <vmassol> when sergiu wakes up  
09:35 <vmassol> thanks!  
09:36 <+sburjan> yepp, I saw in your chat with Sergiu  
09:36 <vmassol> so IMO tomorrow it should be there  
09:36 <vmassol> ok  
09:36 <+sburjan> ok  
09:50 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:35 <vmassol> fyi the slussen wiki guy has answered. He's ok to make modifications. He asked for some questions and I replied. Waiting for his new reply now. Should be arriving soon.  
10:35 <vmassol> (I also asked him to drop in here if he can)  
10:36 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:37 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:47 <+evalica> hi vmassol. can you remove pls newxwiki.xwiki.org from bot notifications? There will be work on it and will spam the list.  
10:47 <vmassol> evalica: hi. I'm wondering  
10:48 <vmassol> maybe we could leave it for now and if/when there are too many, exclude it? personally I like to see what's going on but I agree that at a certain level it'll spam the irc channel  
10:48 <vmassol> what do others think?  
10:48 <jvdrean1> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <+tmortagne> vmassol: +1  
10:48 <jvdrean> has quit  
10:49 <+evalica> personally I don't feel comfortable working like this - this system works if you put finished work on that wiki - but is gonna be used for development  
10:50 <+evalica> and I don't want to write my code locally and only apply it - because it will increase the development time on it. I make lots of versions and save on any change.  
10:50 <vmassol> you're talking about a list, not sure what list you're referring to  
10:51 <vmassol> there are only 3 places where people will see that work is being done: the activity stream, the watchlist and the irc channel  
10:51 <+evalica> about the IRC channel .. that after send the notifications to the list.  
10:51 <vmassol> there's nothing going to the xwik org list  
10:51 <+evalica> the IRC channels sends the notification summary to the notif list  
10:52 <vmassol> no  
10:52 <+tmortagne> well  
10:52 <+tmortagne> not exactly  
10:52 <+tmortagne> you see IRC because that's stored in a xwiki.org page  
10:52 <+tmortagne> and watchlist send summary of all modifications  
10:53 <vmassol> actually not even, she sees that because she subscribed to changes on xwiki.org  
10:53 <vmassol> it's not on by default  
10:53 <+tmortagne> vmassol: it is  
10:53 <vmassol> well I don't receive anything  
10:53 <vmassol> for sure  
10:53 <+evalica> I see that because I'm subscribed to [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
10:53 <vmassol> that's different  
10:53 <vmassol> we don't send anything to notifs  
10:54 <+tmortagne> vmassol: [xwiki-notifications] XWiki updates, 3 documents have been modified since 2011/09/25 00:00  
10:54 <+tmortagne> reweived on [[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
10:54 <vmassol> hmm wait  
10:54 <+tmortagne> received  
10:54 <vmassol> we do you're right  
10:54 <vmassol> I was consugin with myxwiki  
10:54 <vmassol> confusing  
10:54 <vmassol> sorry  
10:54 <vmassol> now back to your point  
10:54 <vmassol> the notif will contain aggregated changes  
10:55 <vmassol> so that's very fine  
10:55 <vmassol> it won't be spam  
10:55 <vmassol> the only "spam"I can think of would be irc  
10:55 <+tmortagne> in any case if there is too much stuff it will be an issue for IRC way before notification so that should not matter  
10:56 <vmassol> now xwiki.org is in the open so whatever you do there people can see the work done, one way or another  
10:56 <+evalica> k - so can we mute the newxwiki on IRC?  
10:56 <vmassol> and it's a good thing  
10:56 <vmassol> (a wanted thing actually)  
10:56 <+evalica> the difference is that they can see the results ... they don't care especially about the process  
10:56 <vmassol> that's your opinion  
10:56 <vmassol> let me them decide  
10:57 <vmassol> s/me them/them/  
10:57 <+evalica> ... k ... spam it is  
10:57 <+tmortagne> anyway i'm +1 to mute it if IRC channel become unreadable but lets see  
10:57 <+evalica> thanks  
10:57 <vmassol> yeah spam  
10:57 <vmassol> :)  
10:57 <vmassol> we'll mute the channel when someone complains  
10:57 <+evalica> spam... or no work :) depends on the feeling  
10:58 <+evalica> so .. my complain was not sufficient  
10:58 <vmassol> its not even started  
10:58 <vmassol> how can you complain about spam!  
10:58 <vmassol> ;)  
10:58 <vmassol> your comlaint is about transparency  
10:58 <vmassol> that's not a valid complaint for me  
10:59 <vmassol> spam is.. but let's wait for it  
10:59 <+evalica> k thanks  
12:11 <Enygma`> has quit  
12:20 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:39 <mflorea> has quit  
12:42 <jvdrean1> has quit  
12:43 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
13:23 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
13:25 <DrLou> has quit  
13:34 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
13:46 <pturcotte> has quit  
14:08 <+sburjan> did you notice the epic and story issue types in jira ? :)  
14:09 <vmassol> I think they come from the greenhopper integration  
14:11 <+sburjan> are we using greenhopper ?  
14:14 <vmassol> no  
14:15 <vmassol> but I may have installed the plugin a long time ago to try it out, I don't really recall  
14:16 <vmassol> or not  
14:16 <+sburjan> ok  
14:17 <vmassol> looks like a jira bug to me  
14:17 <vmassol> checking  
14:18 <vmassol> I had installed greenhoppper a long time ago but it was on my own machine not on jira.xwiki.org  
14:18 <vmassol> so this is something that came with the new jira install  
14:18 <vmassol> IMO the new jira is preconfigured with greenhopper but has some bug that activates it even though we don't have any license  
14:19 <vmassol> ok I've manually removed the new issue types  
14:19 <vmassol> hope they're not going to surface again  
14:36 <jvdrean1> has joined #xwiki  
14:36 <jvdrean> has quit  
14:54 <+sburjan> initially I thought someone added them and was playing around :)  
14:55 <pturcotte> has joined #xwiki  
15:58 <jvdrean1> has quit  
16:01 <vmassol> cjdelisle, tmortagne: re myxwiki.org I've changed the skin on the slussen wiki to use the default colibri  
16:02 <vmassol> (he's allowed me to do so)  
16:03 <vmassol> cjdelisle: so when you have some time, you could try to restart with a new recent snapshot to see if you still have the problem with the panels or not  
16:03 <@cjdelisle> ok  
16:50 <sburjan> has quit  
17:25 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
17:59 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:18 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:00 <evalica> has quit  
20:07 <mflorea> has quit  
20:16 <pgmjsd> has joined #xwiki  
20:20 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
20:20 <@sdumitriu> Finally, got the title indexing correct  
20:21 <@sdumitriu> Fixing checkstyle then commit and start the release  
20:21 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Searching for "stream" now returns Activity Stream, MessageStream (at 100%), then Attachments and messagestream.png  
20:58 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
21:00 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
21:12 <evalica> has quit  
21:25 <@sdumitriu> Starting the release  
21:32 <vmassol> sdumitriu: cool  
21:41 <vmassol> has quit  
23:01 <pturcotte> has quit  
23:11 <florinciu> has joined #xwiki  
23:11 <florinciu> has left #xwiki  
23:16 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
23:53 <abusenius> has quit
